评论概述: Looks good, but not very snug at the waist
评论详情: We ended up using a belt to make it snug around the waist. not the most comfortable material, so be sure to wear a comfy long sleeve underneath and some high waist pants to tuck the shirt under Besides these few things it gets the job done and gives exactly the look you are going for as long as you have a belt!

评论概述: Great Coat, but needed some work
评论详情: For the price, the coat was really cool. Steampunk vibe/pirate vibe. I got XL size and it fit just right (5"10, 215 pounds). Like the color and fit with my Dark Plaque Doctor Vibe.  Cons: The hood on it seemed to small, close to the my head, giving me a world war I vibe with my raven mask (the black hood in my pictures is another one I strapped on top, which also help hide the black military like stripes on the shoulders).  I think the coat is better when you have an idea of what you want to mix with it. I was wearing a black body suit underneath and platform boot (as well as other accessories). So I think it's great when you know what to want to use with, but by itself it could look incomplete.  Otherwise, help me make one of my favorite Ren Fair/Halloween costumes.
It's fits well for a large. Though around the stomach it was a bit short. But other than that, it was really good and works perfectly for a plague doctor outfit.

This is a fun looking coat. I ordered a size larger than normal. Wish I’d gone 2. The sleeves are tight as with most Chinese clothes. The zipper at the hips goes all the way around the body. Not sure I like the looks of the zipper in the back. The fabric is a slightly stretchy polyester, it looks good. The trim on the shoulders doesn’t exactly match the image and is not fully sewed down. I think over all this coat will be good. It’s a statement piece to add to the kid’s wardrobe so he looks cool. My only real beef with it is there are no care instructions. It got wet with some smelly liquid and I don’t know how to get it clean. Being polyester it should be washable. But the faux leather trim concerns me.  Ok so it’s a few days later. I did wash this in a front load washer on delicate, cold, with a slow spin and hung to dry. It worked really well and dried quicker than expected. The wrinkles remained. Overall I was impressed. However, just now the zipper that holds the tails to the coat and goes around the hips, just separated leaving a gap between the tails and the jacket. I should be able to fix it with a little work, but it’s not happening. I’ll try again in a few. But I like the coat enough I’ll get a replacement rather than a refund.

It’s not a coat, just a super thin coat design. I can’t wear it as a coat is intended for extra warmth. It’s strictly costume wear only unless you choose to line it. The collar looks better in the pic than IRL. The zipper ripped off the bottom about an inch immediately when trying to put one end into the other. It only had one thin stitch. I will need to reinforce it. The hood is super narrow and doesn’t cover the whole head. They made the hood neck only about 6 inches wide across the back of the shoulders and it’s straight across the back so it doesn’t curve around the head at all. It barely covers the back of the head.  The overall design is fashionable for a costume but requires a lot of work to make it functional.

评论概述: A bit of a sizing nightmare even with the guide! Thin, baggy in areas and dissapointed..
评论详情: Right.  So, this one was a bit of a trap for me because I love the look of this in the photo. When I expected a cool looking double breasted coat sadly, this was a thin confusingly buttoned mess. I cannot really tell where to fasten it because it always appears off line, the hood just looks a bit "off" like it was just plopped there and I am confused on the correct way that "neck flap" sits.  The fit was very baggy in the sleeves and bunches up underneath the zipper (if buttoning it on the far left because otherwise it boxes you out like a plank with no form fitting and it is comparable to party store costume wear in the thinness and how the cheapest zipper type/ hardware was used to build it up. I wanted to like it more, but I was disappointed. I suppose I should have expected as much here as some would tell me but I usually do not buy things like this here. I much rather be up front about how it really is and not just "let it go because that is how it is". There is some quality things here. It is a LINT MAGNET! Walk outside for a bit and stuff sticks like glue. The belting/straps are flimsy with the cheapest faux buckles that I can see on a cheap one off party costume.  The Takeaway: If you are looking for a cheap outfit and you can tailor it for yourself to wear at a party or part of a quick OC cosplay. Sure! That is why I did not rate it as low as I wanted. It can be made to look good with work. As is, it's just an awkward gaggle of fabric, zippers and snap fasteners.  Pics soon!
poorly made, cheapie material.
These people are just using these pics to sell their homemade knockoff or something. This thing looks like my little sister sewed it together

This was a great buy it looks really cool the only downfall is the hoodie is too small to be a hoodie but it looks good for it to be a jacket with a hoodie with the hood off all kind of cool zippers all that jazz very fun to wear

I got this because it looked like a fun piece for a cosplay I'm doing. I ordered a size up from my measurements and yet it was still WAY tight in the shoulders and arms. The quality is very cheap compared to what you see in the pictures and the snaps/zippers are super bright compared to the cloth. The black "leather" embelishments are cheap stretchy plastic that you have to be super careful to not get caught on stuff.  The hood is WAY smaller than advertised and has the same overly shiny plastic on it which causes glare in any picture you take.  I would not recommend this unless you're getting it to make a new pattern. If you do choose to get it, order at least 2 sizes up and just take in the torso areas.

This doesn't fit at all. I measured every part of my body to make sure that the 3xl would fit and once it was put on it was so tight that if I tried to even clap my hands I feel like it will break and tear. I measured my bust and I was a 47. So as a safety I bought the 3xl which was meant to be a 51 bust. This jacket is so tight that I couldn't even move my arms freely. This is not measured properly and is falsely advertised due to its measurements. At this point I wasted money and can't even replace it for a 4xl because a 4xl isn't even offered. So in all honesty if you plan on buying this for any sort of cosplay or halloween costume, avoid it and save the money for really expensive versions. Because cheap is not the way to go.
